headline: A Look at Global Payments (GPN) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Global Payments (GPN) stock has seen its fair share of ups and downs recently, with shares moving roughly 5% higher over the past month. Investors are weighing the company’s latest performance in comparison to longer-term trends. See our latest analysis for Global Payments. After a rocky patch earlier this year, Global Payments' recent 3.6% gain over the past month hints at shifting momentum. Even so, its year-to-date share price return remains down nearly 22%, and the one-year total...
